Command.Description: Moves the turtle back to the center of the screen and removes all pen traces
Command.HelpDocumentation: If the turtle is not currently centered both horizontally and vertically, then this command will return it to the origin which is at the center of the screen. Additionally, it will remove any trails the turtle left behind while the pen was down, and it was moving.

ReturnValue.description: This command does not return a value.
